txt.en: You should collect phials of the Elves' healing draught from within Felegoth.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
Sprinkle trees in need with the healing draught ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should return to Radagast, who can be found at the tree nursery just outside of Felegoth.
You should defeat corrupted roots and give water to trees in need throughout Eryn Lasgalen.
Sprinkle trees in need with the healing draught ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ah, there is more to be done! The Elves of Felegoth have prepared more healing draughts for the ailing roots of Eryn Lasgalen, and I would ask that you nourish those in need. For those too far gone to decay and corruption, do what you must. Nature heals most of its ills, but we must help where we can.\n\n'Take some phials with you and venture into the forest. Eryn Lasgalen shall flourish once more!'
Radagast has grown concerned by the ailing roots of Eryn Lasgalen and hopes to heal the forest of decay and corruption.
'Ah, I feel the life returning to this land. That is good. Good indeed!\n\n'I will call on you again soon!'
